thread.title: Fox News: Investigators Expect Potential ‘Smoking Gun’ Evidence on Obama Surveillance of Donald Trump’s Team
thread.title_full: Fox News: Investigators Expect Potential ‘Smoking Gun’ Evidence on Obama Surveillance of Donald Trump’s Team

author: Neil Munro
title: Fox News: Investigators Expect Potential ‘Smoking Gun’ Evidence on Obama Surveillance of Donald Trump’s Team
text: GOP staffers on Capitol Hill expect to get "smoking gun" evidence that officials in former President Barack Obama's departing administration used long-standing surveillance programs at intelligence agencies to indirectly spy on President-elect Donald Trump's team, says Fox News.
